Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily productivity and streamline your workflow. With its innovative features, this product has been a game-changer for many users seeking efficiency and convenience. Given its high-quality design and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $200. This special price is valid for a limited time only. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
